  • what's this?

  • Welcome to trademarkhell.net, the designated dumping ground for my ramblings, thoughts, and rambling thoughts. I mostly just use this site to publish my pseudo-essays on various topics, predominantly relating to my interests.

    I unfortunately haven't yet thought of a pretentious way to describe my site as a internet utopia which will change the world, so the best I can do is a philisophical quote generator, which I'll attach below. Thank me for my boundless wisdom later.

    loading...

    Anyways, click around the site if you want, there's probably cool stuff (if page long essays about useless things are considered cool nowadays)

  • what's new?

        • Discord and the Death of Forums // 30 August 2024
          Discord has somehow replaced just about every niche forum that once existed, and this mildly annoys me. This annoyance doesn't actually justify an article, but trademarkhell.net isn't about justification. Discord shot and killed my favorite forum, more on the article, click it, or else something may happen.
        • English Is Actually Pretty Interesting // 29 August 2024
          English is a lot more historically and grammatically interesting than you may think. Nobody really cares about this, for good reason, but I'm here to be that one person who cares. This is just me rambling on about what I think makes English such a cool language. (plus you're reading it in English..)
